PyScript Counter

This counter runs entirely in the browser using MicroPython. No server requests needed.

0

How it works

Python runs directly in your browser via WebAssembly. The counter state is managed client-side without any server communication.

@when("click", "#btn-increment")
def increment(event):
    el = document.querySelector("#count")
    el.innerText = str(int(el.innerText) + 1)
